pkgmetadata.longdescription: Amp Locker is a guitar amplifier simulator plugin by Audio Assault. It provides a collection of amp models, cabinet simulations, impulse responses, and NAM (Neural Amp Modeler) profiles for guitar tone shaping. Available as LV2, VST3, and standalone application.

use.flag: Install LV2 plugin format (enabled by default)
Install VST3 plugin format (enabled by default)
